dish_description: Traditional pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, basil, and olive oil
Pasta dish with egg, pancetta, pecorino cheese, and black pepper
Breaded chicken cutlets topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese
Creamy risotto with mixed mushrooms, Parmesan cheese, and white wine
Layers of pasta, Bolognese sauce, bechamel, and melted cheese baked to perfection
Fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil, olive oil, and balsamic glaze
Classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream
Potato dumplings with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and basil
Braised veal shanks with vegetables, white wine, and gremolata
Creamy Italian dessert topped with fruit compote or caramel sauce
